entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @IvankaTrump Thank you, Ivanka. Love having you in the White House. Please attend some of the figure Coronavirus Task Force meetings. Would love to hear you speak to the American people. You could potentially be our first woman President.
